ipywidgets_toggle_buttons package¶

Submodules¶

ipywidgets_toggle_buttons.abc_toggle_buttons module¶

Abstract class for all toggle buttons

class ToggleButtonsABC(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract class for all toggle buttons

Values are stored in self.widget_parent when displayed is self.widget Which is updated in the moment when display() is launched

property layout¶

Property for direct modify of widgets layout

Returns

Layout of shown widget

Return type

Method for direct observe of changes in widget

Getter for options used in widget
